scripts.test-local: bash -c 'yarn test --coverage > test-results.log 2>&1; if grep -q "^FAIL" test-results.log; then grep -A 20 "^FAIL" test-results.log | GREP_COLORS="mt=1;31" grep --color=always -E "FAIL|at Object.<anonymous>"; else grep -E "PASS|Test Suites:|Tests:|Snapshots:|Time:|Ran all test suites" test-results.log | sed -E "s/(PASS)/\x1b[32m\1\x1b[0m/g; s/(FAIL)/\x1b[31m\1\x1b[0m/g; s/(Test Suites:|Tests:|Snapshots:|Time:|Ran all test suites)/\x1b[34m\1\x1b[0m/g"; fi; echo ""; echo "-------------------------------------------------------------|---------|----------|---------|---------|-------------------"; cat test-results.log | sed -n "/File/,/Uncovered Line #s/p";'
